name: PlaywrightFrameworkNode
postCreateCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y software-properties-common && curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | apt-key add - && add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) stable" && apt-get install -y docker-ce-cli && curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.38.0/install.sh | bash && export NVM_DIR="$([ -z "${XDG_CONFIG_HOME-}" ] && printf %s "${HOME}/.nvm" || printf %s "${XDG_CONFIG_HOME}/nvm")" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm install 20.11.1
postStartCommand: npm install -g npm@latest && npm install && npx playwright install --with-deps
